mapper.select: select a.cartNo, a.productCode, a.id, a.amount, b.productName, b.price from cart a left outer join product b on a.productCode = b.productCode where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update cart set amount = #{amount} where cartNo = #{cartNo}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where id = #{id} and productCode = #{productCode}
